summary.span: 表示可按索引单独访问的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了前面所述，此类的成员的行为完全如 、 和文档所述 。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **冻结功能：** 由于该类继承自 类，因此 该类提供若干特殊功能： 对象可以声明为 [资源](/dotnet/desktop-wpf/fundamentals/xaml-resources-define)、在多个对象之间共享、变为只读以提高性能、克隆以及使线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as [resources](/dotnet/desktop-wpf/fundamentals/xaml-resources-define), shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关对象提供的不同功能的详细信息 ，请参阅可 [冻结对象概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview). ## XAML 隐式集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreTransformKeyFrameObjectElements**oneOrMoreTransformKeyFrameObjectElements* 使用对象元素语法声明的一个或多个对象。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.
